question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. sheep
B. shepherd dog
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The sheep is in the foreground, being petted by people, while the shepherd dog is further back in the scene, clearly establishing the sheep as closer to the camera.
